item.title: 至关重要的一周拉开帷幕，股市呈现看涨基调
item.description:
美欧贸易协议提振股市，美联储和就业报告迫在眉睫。【原文：

US-EU trade deal lifts stocks as Fed, jobs report loom.

】

item.title: 特朗普关税已阻碍世界经济增长
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济编辑。今天，我们来看看肖恩-唐南（Shawn Donnan）关于特朗普关税运动拖累经济的报道。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics editor in Sydney. Today, we look at Shawn Donnan’s reporting on the economic drag from Trump’s tariff campaign. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 汽车关税引发加拿大曾经骄傲的汽车城裁员忧虑
item.description:
通用汽车公司面临着贸易战带来的数十亿美元的成本。奥沙瓦的居民已经在为此付出代价。【原文：

General Motors is exposed to billions in costs from the trade war. The residents of Oshawa are already paying the price. 

】

item.title: 受欧盟制裁的纳亚拉能源公司将于本周接收伊拉克原油
item.description: 一艘超级油轮将在未来一两天内向印度纳亚拉能源公司（Nayara Energy）运送伊拉克原油，托运人称这将是该炼油厂被欧盟制裁后首次卸下非俄罗斯石油。【原文：A supertanker is set to deliver Iraqi crude to India’s Nayara Energy in the next day or two, in what shippers say will be the first discharge of non-Russian oil since the refiner was sanctioned by the European Union.】

item.title: 爱尔兰经济自 2023 年以来首次出现萎缩
item.description: 在本周即将公布的欧元区数据之前，一份不祥的报告显示，爱尔兰经济在上一季度突然出现萎缩，这是自2023年以来的首次。【原文：Ireland’s economy abruptly contracted during the last quarter for the first time since 2023, in an ominous report before euro-zone data due this week.】

item.title: 特朗普的初步贸易 "餐巾纸 "协议面临审查
item.description: 框架。初步协议。关税协议。贸易协定。这些只是用来描述唐纳德-特朗普总统在8月1日最后期限之前与欧盟、日本和其他一些经济体签署的协议的几个词。【原文：Frameworks. Preliminary accords. Tariff deals. Trade agreements. These are just a few of the words used to describe what President Donald Trump is inking with economies like the European Union, Japan and a handful of others on the homestretch before his Aug. 1 deadline.】

item.title: 尽管特朗普做出了努力，但价格更贵的无笼养鸡蛋在美国仍在蓬勃发展
item.description:
在美国，高价产品比以往任何时候都更受欢迎，司法部的诉讼对此无能为力。【原文：

The premium-priced product is more popular than ever in the US, and there’s not much a DOJ lawsuit can do about it.

】

item.title: 对债券交易商而言，贝森特财政部现在的一切都与票据有关
item.description: 自斯科特-贝森特 1 月份执掌财政部以来，债券交易商对他在 29 万亿美元美国国债市场上的发行策略这一关键问题的看法发生了180 度的转变。【原文：Since Scott Bessent took the Treasury’s helm in January, bond dealers have done a 180 on the key question about his issuance strategy in the $29 trillion market for US Treasuries.】

item.title: StanChart 的加密货币部门 Zodia Markets 获得 1800 万美元融资
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered PLC）的加密货币子公司 Zodia Markets Ltd. 在一轮融资中筹集了 1825 万美元，这将减少该金融集团在数字资产交易平台中的股份。【原文：Standard Chartered PLC’s crypto subsidiary Zodia Markets Ltd. has raised $18.25 million in a funding round that will reduce the financial group’s stake in the digital asset trading platform.】

item.title: 新加坡航空公司利润暴跌，印度航空公司亏损触底
item.description: 由于印度航空公司（Air India Ltd.）的亏损和利息收入减少，新加坡航空公司（Singapore Airlines Ltd.）第一季度利润下滑。【原文：Singapore Airlines Ltd.’s profit slumped in the first quarter as losses from Air India Ltd. and lower interest income weighed on the company’s financial results.】

item.title: 阿达赫债权人同意从库尔森手中接管包装公司
item.description: Ardagh Group SA 已同意进行债务重组，部分债权人将从爱尔兰亿万富翁保罗-库尔森（Paul Coulson）手中接管整个企业。【原文：Ardagh Group SA has agreed with a debt restructuring which will see some of its creditors take control of the whole business from Irish billionaire Paul Coulson.】

item.title: 尽管面临关税威胁，药明康德仍实现半年营收增长
item.description: 药明康德公司（WuXi AppTec Co.【原文：WuXi AppTec Co. reported first-half revenue that beat expectations, overcoming challenges brought on by trade tariffs and US-China tensions.】

item.title: Adnoc斥资 120 亿欧元收购 Covestro 遭欧盟补贴调查
item.description: 阿布扎比国家石油公司（Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.【原文：Abu Dhabi National Oil Co.’s planned takeover of Covestro AG for nearly €12 billion ($14 billion) has been hit by an in-depth European Union probe under the bloc’s tough new foreign-subsidy rules.】

item.title: 安哥拉出租车罢工导致小巴乘客受困
item.description: 安哥拉小巴司机因燃料成本上涨开始为期三天的罢工，导致非洲产油国首都罗安达的乘客滞留。【原文：Angolan minibus drivers began a three-day strike over rising fuel costs, stranding passengers in Luanda, the capital of the oil-producing African nation.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行的卡尔瓦西纳认为，现在就排除关税对盈利的影响为时尚早
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行资本市场（RBC Capital Markets）的策略师认为，美国报告季开局良好，但现在就撇开关税对通胀和企业盈利的影响还为时过早。【原文：The US reporting season is off to a strong start, but it would be premature to write off the impact of tariffs on inflation and corporate earnings, according to RBC Capital Markets strategists.】

item.title: 软银支持的 Lenskart 计划本周提交 10 亿美元的首次公开募股申请
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度眼镜零售商 Lenskart Solutions Pvt.【原文：Indian eyewear retailer Lenskart Solutions Pvt. is planning to file for an initial public offering of about $1 billion as early as this week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿达尼绿色公司利润飙升，工厂安装速度加快
item.description: 阿达尼绿色能源有限公司（Adani Green Energy Ltd. ）的第一季度利润比去年同期攀升了 60%，主要原因是发电量大幅增加和售电量激增。【原文：Adani Green Energy Ltd.’s first-quarter profit climbed 60% from a year earlier, driven by a sharp rise in generation capacity and a surge in electricity sales.】

item.title: 据说帝亚吉欧将邀请美国银行和高盛集团对东非业务进行审查
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，帝亚吉欧集团已选择美国银行和高盛集团对东非啤酒有限公司进行战略审查，因为该酒商希望采用轻资产模式来释放资金，以恢复增长。【原文：Diageo Plc has picked Bank of America Corp. and Goldman Sachs Group Inc. for a strategic review of East African Breweries Ltd., people familiar with the matter said, as the distiller looks to an asset light model to free up capital for reviving growth.】

item.title: 奥本海默上调 S&P 500 指数目标，呼吁第三年实现 20% 涨幅
item.description: 根据奥本海默资产管理公司（Oppenheimer Asset Management）的数据，贸易谈判的进展将使 S&P 500 指数连续第三年实现 20% 的涨幅，这是自 20 世纪 90 年代末以来从未有过的。【原文：Progress in trade negotiations will take the S&P 500 to a third consecutive year of 20% gains, according to Oppenheimer Asset Management, a feat unseen since the late 1990s.】

item.title: 卡齐米尔认为欧洲央行在没有冲击的情况下将在 9 月维持利率不变
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员彼得-卡齐米尔（Peter Kazimir）认为，除非有证据表明经济出现严重恶化，否则央行不应在 9 月份降息。【原文：The European Central Bank shouldn’t cut interest rates in September unless there’s evidence of a major deterioration in the economy, according to Governing Council member Peter Kazimir.】

item.title: 做空者在风险最高的美股上损失 25 亿美元
item.description: 对于做空风险最高美股的交易员来说，本月是残酷的一个月，随着动物精神给散户投资者带来无限信心，策略师们预计熊市的苦难还将继续。【原文：It’s been a brutal month for traders shorting the riskiest US stocks, and as animal spirits imbue retail investors with boundless confidence, strategists expect the misery to continue for bears.】

item.title: NBA 非洲赞助商赫利俄斯计划加强体育投资
item.description: Helios Investment Partners 是一家专注于非洲的私募股权投资公司，该公司表示正计划加大对体育和娱乐业的投资，以利用非洲大陆年轻人使用手机观看比赛和音乐会的激增需求。【原文：Helios Investment Partners, an Africa-focused private equity firm, said it is planning to boost investment in sports and entertainment to capitalize on surging demand from the continent’s youth using mobile phones to watch games and concerts.】

item.title: 欧盟对俄罗斯实施限制后，印度炼油商更广泛地寻找石油
item.description: 印度是俄罗斯原油的最大进口国，在乌克兰战争期间欧盟对克里姆林宫实施新制裁后，印度的炼油商可能会考虑从莫斯科分散购买一些原油。【原文：Oil refiners in India, the biggest importer of Russian crude, may be looking at diversifying some buying away from Moscow after fresh European Union sanctions on the Kremlin amid the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 中国推出育儿补贴以提高出生率
item.description: 中国宣布将开始在全国范围内发放育儿补贴，这是继近年来令人担忧的出生率下降之后，中国为提高出生率而采取的最新举措。【原文：China announced that it will start handing out childcare subsidies across the nation, in its latest push to boost birthrates after a worrying drop in recent years.】

item.title: 拳击、后空翻机器人统治中国最大的人工智能峰会
item.description: 从笨重的六英尺机器到灵活的翻跟头狗，机器人在本周于上海举行的中国最重要的年度人工智能大会上大显身手。数以千计的人来到现场，目不转睛地观看各种机器人在工作时的滑稽动作：分发爆米花和饮料（乱七八糟的）、剥鸡蛋、在拳击场上比武、打麻将，或者只是在巨大的展厅里闲逛。【原文：From lumbering six-foot machines to nimble back-flipping dogs, robots lorded over China’s most important annual AI conference in Shanghai this week. Thousands turned up to gawk at the antics of a bewildering array of droids at work: dispensing popcorn and drinks (messily), peeling eggs, sparring in a boxing ring, playing mahjong or just wandering around the cavernous exhibition hall.】

item.title: KNDS 与 Triton 在伦克股权纠纷后达成协议
item.description: 投资公司 Triton Partners 已同意将其在变速箱制造商伦克集团（Renk Group AG）的约一半股份转让给法德防务公司 KNDS NV，从而解决了自今年 2 月以来一直拖延的争端。【原文：Investment firm Triton Partners has agreed to transfer about half of its shares in gearbox maker Renk Group AG to Franco-German defense company KNDS NV, settling a dispute that has dragged on since February.】

item.title: 通用汽车和塞文特伦特抓住风险情绪，临时出售债券
item.description: 通用汽车金融公司（General Motors Financial Co Inc.【原文：General Motors Financial Co Inc. and UK utility Severn Trent are seizing on a rally in European markets to bring euro debt offerings.】

item.title: 印度保险巨头求助华尔街银行规避风险
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度人寿保险公司正在与华尔街最大的几家银行合作，对冲其负债。【原文：Life Insurance Corp. of India is working with some of Wall Street’s largest banks to hedge its liabilities, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚推出对冲波动的定向电力期货
item.description: 澳大利亚世界领先的屋顶太阳能热潮促使该国最大的证券交易所从其峰值电力对冲合约中削减了一天中的中间时段。【原文：Australia’s world-leading rooftop solar boom has helped lead the nation’s top bourse to cut the middle of the day from its peak power hedging contract.】
